TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler(object sender, CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs)
public delegate void CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs ^ e);
type CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler = delegate of obj * CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 调用处理程序的命令目标。

span.span: The command target that is invoking the handler.

summary.span: 表示用来处理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定与事件源关联的命令能否对命令目标执行。The determines if the command associated with the event source is able to execute on the command target. 如果命令具有指定目标的命令源, 则可以通过`sender`获取目标信息。If the command has a command source that specifies a target, then the target information can be obtained through `sender`. 如果未设置, 则具有键盘焦点的元素是目标, 还可以通过`sender`获取。 If the is not set, the element with keyboard focus is the target, and can also be obtained through `sender`. 如果确定命令可以在目标上执行, 则应将属性设置为`true`; 否则, 请将其设置为`false`。If it is determined that the command can execute on the target, then the property should be set to `true`; otherwise, set it to `false`. 您无需依赖于事件数据来确定命令、源和目标。You do not need to rely on event data to determine the command, source, and target. 你可以将处理程序的使用限制为已知的可能的命令调用, 不过, 如果你的命令结构广泛依赖于命令路由, 以便对事件中的后续潜在目标执行相同的命令, 则这会更难完成。路由.You can limit the usage of the handler to known possible command invocations, although this is more difficult to accomplish if your command structure relies extensively on the command routing to execute the same command on successive potential targets in an event route. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个设置为`true`的。The following example shows a that sets to `true`. [!code-csharp[commandwithhandler#CommandHandlerCanExecuteHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/commandWithHandler/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandhandlercanexecutehandler)] [!code-vb[commandwithhandler#CommandHandlerCanExecuteHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/commandWithHandler/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#commandhandlercanexecutehandler)]
